thread.title: Celebrations in Israel and Rafah as Hamas agrees to a cease-fire proposal
thread.title_full: Celebrations in Israel and Rafah as Hamas agrees to a cease-fire proposal

author: Ava
title: Celebrations in Israel and Rafah as Hamas agrees to a cease-fire proposal
text:
Hamas said it had agreed to a cease-fire proposal, prompting celebrations on both sides, but Israel said the deal was not the one it had put forth and was studying the parameters.
